articles.author: Brian Davids
articles.title: Amandla Stenberg and Leslye Headland Thought the ‘Star Wars: The Acolyte’ Twist Would Leak Much Sooner - Hollywood Reporter
articles.description: The first episode revealed a surprise co-lead of the show, someone the star and the creator believed would leak long before the series premiere.
articles.content:
[This story contains spoilers for the first two episodes of Star Wars: The Acolyte.]
If you study enough trailers and promotional spots, you’ll start to notice the very deep game that trailer editor… [+7277 chars]
